item.title: deque
item.description: python的双端队列库：deque d = collections.deque([]) d.append(‘a’) # 在最右边添加一个元素，此时 d=deque(‘a’) d.appendleft(‘b’) # 在最左边添加一个元素，此时 d=deque([‘b’, ‘a’]) d.extend([‘c’,‘d’]) # 在最右边添加所有元素，此时 d=deque([‘b’,

item.title: Crontab
item.description: cron是一个Linux定时执行工具，可以在无需人工干预的情况下运行作业。在Ubuntu server 下，cron是被默认安装并启动的。 edit crontab sudo crontab -e input script you

item.title: 03design_pattern_intro
item.description: Design Pattern Overview Q:What does a pattern do? A:Documents a recurring重复出现的 problem/solution paring within a given context Essential elements Pattern name Used to provide a single and meaningful name to the pattern which defines a design problem and a solution for it. Naming a design pattern helps itself to be referred to others easily. Allows easy documentation

item.title: 1.Introduction
item.description: Qualities of a well designed software Correctness 正确性 The degree with which software adheres to its specified requirements . At the start of the software life cycle, the requirements for the software are determined and formalized in the requirements specification document. Well designed software should meet all the stated requirements. While it might seem obvious that software should be correct, the reality is that this characteristic is one

item.title: 01 Introduction 简介
item.description: 01 Introduction 简介 1) What is biological vision? 生物视觉 Definitions: It is one of the senses that animals use to survive in their environment. 定义： 它是动物在环境中生存的一种感觉。 Vision in biological systems consists of two parts: 生物系统的视觉包括两部分: Sensor/eye –

item.title: Java_installation
item.description: Use Homebrew to install: // install the latest version $ brew cask install java // for the certain version e.g. java8 $ brew cask install java8 Set the environment variable: check the Installation directory in Finder. e.g. /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.7.0_55.jdk/Contents/Home vim ~./zshrc export JAVA_HOME=/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.7.0_55.jdk/Contents/Home export CLASSPATH=$JAVA_HOME/lib/tools.jar:$JAVA_HOME/lib/dt.jar export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH: source ~./zshrc

item.title: Homebrew
item.description: Installation Search the location of xxx: $ brew search xxx Install xxx according to the location: $ brew install xxx $ brew cask install xxx Search the information such as version: $ brew info xxx Update Update Homebrew itself: brew update List newer versions of all the apps: $ brew outdated Upgrade // upgrade all $ brew upgrade // upgrade xxx $ brew upgrade xxx Cleanup clean up the old

item.title: Shortcuts
item.description: 可显示隐藏文件 defaults write com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles -boolean true;killall Finder 再次隐藏文件，可以输入命令“defaults write com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles -boolean false;killall Finder”。 但 MacOs 自带的 Terminal 在 功能上 不够强大 一般都会用iT

item.title: Anaconda
item.description: Search the package: $ brew search anaconda and find it is in cask. Then install it: $ brew cask install anaconda Then export the environment variable: //zsh $ echo 'export PATH=/usr/local/anaconda3/bin:$PATH' >> ~/.zshrc $ source ~/.zshrc //bash $ echo 'export PATH=/usr/local/anaconda3/bin:$PATH' >> ~/.bash_profile $ source ~/.bash_profile and confirm the installation: $ conda –-version Finally set the default Python version: $ which python3.7

item.title: New terminal: iterm2
item.description: I’m writing to introduce two lovely apps to make our terminal more convenient and comfortable. Here are the leading roles: iTerm2 - macOS Terminal Replacement Oh My Zsh - a delightful & open source framework for Zsh Xcode The iterm2 need to be installed by homebrew, and before that we have to install the Xcode or Xcode command line tools first. For installing Xcode command line tools run: $ xcode-select

item.title: My first Mac
item.description: After having a permission of my parents to buy a new laptop, I was entangled with two types: Lenovo Ideapad Legion Y540-15 and A2159 Macbook-Pro 2019. Finally I chose my dreaming mpb for the convenience of building coding environments and helping me quit the gaming addiction(maybe). With the discount at the school starting time from Apple, I’ve got my treasure 13' Macbook-Pro 2019 wih 2 thunderbolt 3 ports/Ram:16GB/Memory:512GB with ￥

item.title: Screen 会话
item.description: screen 会话命令可以保持本地和服务器断开后，程序继续在服务器上运行 创建 screen -S session_name 切出去 Ctrl + A + D 列出所有的session screen -ls (或screen -list) 恢复se

item.title: Common Usages
item.description: Difference between ‘Null’ and ‘None’ There is no Null in Python, which means blank string str('') Difference between ‘is’ and ‘==’ == describes same value ‘is’ represents same object, including same addresses, same value, same everything.

item.title: Writing
item.description: 写作我几乎没有完整写过几篇作文，但是只要按照套路做，是稳定能到6分的。刘洪波的《雅思写作真经总纲》是我踏踏实实放心写作部分，去花时间在其他几

item.title: Listening
item.description: 每一年的听力侧重点不一样，题型也会有变化，但基本上都与最新的剑桥雅思官方真题类似。例如目前最新的剑14，听力中大多数填空题都会要求只填写一个

item.title: Hugo的搭建与使用
item.description: Hugo是一个用Go语言编写的静态网站生成器，是一个非常适合搭建静态博客的工具。相似的生成器还有Hexo，Github自家生成器Jekyll
